review_data.title: As authentic as it gets
review_data.content: Delicious authentic Thai and Asian food. The red Thai curry was a true feast for the palate. Creamy, rich in taste, spicy enough and with fresh and well balanced ingredients. The duck we had with it was juicy and rich, but the average guest in...More

review_data.title: Spitze!
review_data.content: Tolles, schmackhaftes, frisches und preiswertes Essen! Ganz nette Bedienung! Wir kommen bald wieder!

review_data.title: Neu und super
